          <title>
            <string language="sl">Komunikacija, omrežje, internet</string>
            <string language="en">Network, internet, communication</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Netz, Internet, Kommunikation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réseau, Internet, transmission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rede, Internet, uma comunicação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rete, Internet, comunicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δίκτυο, Διαδίκτυο, επικοινωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Red, Internet, comunicación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učitelj poenostavi predstavo komunikacij, omrežja, interneta. Učenec bo razumel delovanje komunikacija, omrežja, internetnih storitev.</string>
            <string language="en">How to present terms - communication, network and internet to the learners.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">osnovni pojmi informatike</string>
            <string language="en">basic terms of informatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">internet</string>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">komunikacija</string>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Bezeichnungen - Kommunikation, Netz und 
Internet den Anfängern darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment présenter des limites - transmission, 
réseau et Internet aux étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como apresentar termos - uma comunicação, rede e
Internet aos learners.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come presentare i termini - comunicazione, rete ed
Internet ai principianti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να παρουσιάσει τους όρους - επικοινωνία, δίκτυο 
και Διαδίκτυο στους αρχαρίους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo presentar los términos - comunicación, red
e Internet a los principiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grundlegende Bezeichnungen von Informatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
